remarks: Projection of vector difference is difference of projections. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2000.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjadjt.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjsubi $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( A -h B ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) ) $.
